briefTitle: Evaluation of a New Radiotracer (64Cu-DOTA-AE105) for Diagnosing Aggressive Cancer With Positron Emission Tomography
officialTitle: 64Cu-DOTA-AE105. Evaluation of a New Radiotracer Targeting uPAR (Urokinase Plasminogen Activator Receptor) for Positron Emission Tomography Imaging of the Invasive Cancer Phenotype. First in Man.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Urinary Bladder Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* clinical diagnosis of cancer of prostate, breast or urinary bladder
* capable of understanding and giving full informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* pregnancy
* lactation
* contraindication for the use of intravenous CT contrast-agencies
* claustrophobia
* other current/or former diagnosed cancers, except non melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in situ cervicis uteri
